draw classic MDS plots

Source: R/ML.funs.r
draw.classic.MDS.Rd

draw classic MDS plots

Usage

draw.classic.MDS(
  phenoDF,
  fMat = NULL,
  distMat = NULL,
  PC = 1:3,
  figMain = NULL,
  ofPre = NULL,
  colorCol = "black",
  doReturn = TRUE,
  ...
)

Arguments

phenoDF

data.frame; row: subject; column: features to be used as color in the plot

fMat

NULL, matrix; row: subjects at the same order as phenoDF; column: features

distMat

distance matrix; subjects at the same order as phenoDF;

PC

1:3, integer vector; dimensions to plot

figMain

NULL, char; title of the plots

ofPre

NULL, char; prefix of output file name (including path)

colorCol

'black', char; the color of each subject in the plot; can also be a column in phenoDF

doReturn

TRUE, logical; should a list of ggplot objects be returned?

...

passed to ggpubr::ggscatter

Value

a list of ggplot objects if doReturn = TRUE

Examples

# none
